title.title: Improvement works on the Jubilee line

texts: Buses will replace Tube services on the Jubilee line between Waterloo and Neasden on Saturday and Sunday 25 and 26 June 2005 while track replacement works are undertaken.
This will improve the reliability and give a smoother ride on the Jubilee line.
The Jubilee line will therefore be operating in two separate sections between Stratford and Waterloo and between Neasden and Stanmore while Tube Lines carry out this work.
The Metropolitan line will also be suspended south of Wembley Park on the same weekend.

Bus service A
Baker Street to Willesden Green calling at all Jubilee line stations

Bus service B
Willesden Green to Wembley Park calling at Dollis Hill, but not Neasden Station

Bus service C
Non-stop Wembley Park to Stonebridge Park
London Underground tickets and passes will be valid on the local bus routes to reach alternative London Underground lines.
Passengers are advised to start their journeys at least 30 minutes earlier.
For 24-hour information on all London travel, please call: 020 7222 1234 or visit TfL's website .
